column1: Uchi////Next was dessert. The three of us couldn't decide on dessert
column2: so we decided to order one-each and share. They were all delicious and inventive - fried milk
column3: lemon sorbet and the dessert of the night
column4: which I believe was chocolate (something mousse-like) with orange. The fried milk was my choice and it did not disappoint. Little crunchy pillows that
